content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of steam engine (position 0.5, 0.5), boiler (position 0.5, 6.0) and requires connection via pipes to function properly.

### Copper plate factory at position(-5.0, -65.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position -5.0, -65.0) which is currently full and not processing due to full output.
- Burner mining drill (position 47.0, -82.0) extracting iron ore.

### Wooden chests
Consists of multiple wooden chests located at:
- Position (46.5, -83.5)
- Position (48.5, -83.5)
- Position (5.5, -79.5)
- Position (10.5, -79.5)
- Position (-4.5, -63.5)

### Copper ore mine at position(2.5, -73.5)
Consists of burner mining drill (position 47.0, -82.0) extracting iron ore.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing pipes
- Ensure to keep a sufficient supply of pipes in inventory to connect the boiler to the steam engine.

### Errors when placing Offshore Pump
- Ensure the Offshore Pump is in inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
